title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature        NPS Photo   Â      Gunsight Butte on Lake Powell NPS  Glen Canyon National Recreation Area preserves and protects 1.2 million acres of the Colorado Plateau, a vast landscape of colorful buttes, mesas, canyons, and cliffs. Arid to semi-arid, the region supports a complex and often fragile ecosystem. Plants and wildlife have developed unique adaptations to the hot, arid conditions of their environment and contribute to the rich diversity of life in the area.  Animals Critters everywhere!
